description.html:
Made of super soft pima cotton, this lightweight scarf is laid out in a chic, continuous loop. Double it or drape it to create the perfect embellishment to any ensemble.

  • 58" L x 32" W
  • Cotton/Viscose blend

items.meta_description: Made of super soft pima cotton, this lightweight scarf is laid out in a chic, continuous loop. Double it or drape it to create the perfect embellishment to any ensemble. 58" L x 32" W. Cotton/Viscose blend.
items.name: Ombre Infinity Scarf
